content: May 4 (Reuters) - Ferrari's top executives told analysts in a post-earnings call:

* CEO: NO PLANS TO EXTEND LIFE OF CARS BEYOND WHAT ORIGINALLY PLANNED* CEO: WE HAVE DIFFERENT KIND OF CHEMISTRY FOR BATTERIES, TAILORED FOR OUR NEEDS* CEO: RECENT EU DECISION ON E-FUELS CONFIRMS VALIDITY OF OUR STRATEGY* CEO: WE ANNOUNCED MID-SINGLE DIGIT PRICE INCREASES ON SELECTED MODELS AND THAT IS WHAT WE ARE DOING* CFO: INFLATION GROWING IN A NUMBER OF COMMODITIES, METAL AND ENERGY ARE NO LONGER THE MOST RELEVANT THIS YEAR Further company coverage: (Reporting by Milan Newsroom)
